body.value: <font color="lightgrey">Well, I come from a place where sugar is very important. Louisiana was a sugar state. And the portion of the poem that I read-- it's a rather long poem, and I read an excerpt from it. And so that portion is the introduction to the topic of sugar. And much later in the poem, there's all this stuff about the processing of sugar, and the growing of sugar and all of this stuff.</font>
